generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic flowing, including cars and a truck.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, separated by curbs, with pedestrians walking on them.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and on the sides of the road, including modern office buildings and older structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the roadside, providing greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalks in the background.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver BMW and a silver sedan.
- truck: A large orange truck is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green signals.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other utility poles are visible throughout the scene.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and possibly speed limit signs, attached to poles.
